author: josh
msg: Added constants for IF() and CHOOSE() function indexes

author: scottbw
msg: Applied patch for WOOKIE-41 to enable emails to be sent with authentication; it also requires Apache Commons Email, which has been added to the ivy.xml file. (Thanks to Ross Gardler for the patch ... and sorry for taking so long to apply it!)

author: davisp
msg: Fix weird error with JS_DefineFunctions call.

I found a fairly odd case with JS_DefineFunctions returning success without actually having defined any functions on the global object. This was happening on an Ubuntu 9.10 machine with Spidermonkey 1.7 which is most odd.
I refactored the code to iterate over the JSFunctionSpec array and define the functions one by one which appears to alleviate the issue.
